title: T206 lots for sale or trade, including SLers (SOLDDD)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206 lots for sale or trade, including SLers (SOLDDD)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
Thinning the heard some more, and was able to upgrade a few SLers.  I am looking for Eddie Collins T206's I need in G-VG range and Collins T213's.

4 Card Lot: $70 delivered
Maddox EPDG: writting on back
Shaw: Paper loss back, bottom, center.  Huge card, super clean, crease free
Perring: Bright card, very light writting on back
Barry: Touch of paper loss on front and back

Southern League Lot: $95 delivered
Revelle: Paper loss on front
Miller: has some love!
Ellam: Pencil mark, back center

5 Card Lot: $80 delivered
All just have some wear, but a pretty nice lot.  Killian has a small "FS" stamp on the back.

Take them all for $235 delivered
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
